title: Sponsored: Transforming the Auto Industry with Henrik Fisker
description:
Auto innovator Henrik Fisker joins Let’s Workflow It to discuss the sustainable transformations happening in the car industry, the importance of being able to pivot as a leader, and how nearly all our experiences involving cars are ready for change. Henrik is the Chairman and CEO of car company Fisker, Inc. Before that, he designed cars for BMW and Aston Martin.
Listen and subscribe wherever you get your podcasts.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
